programme.desc: A l'été 1937, à Culver City, en Californie, Stan Laurel Et Oliver Hardy ne sont plus les grandes vedettes comiques qu'ils étaient à Hollywood, à l'époque où leurs films, aimés du public et des critiques, étaient doublés dans de nombreuses langues et connus à travers le monde. Les deux comédiens, toujours sous contrat avec le producteur Hal Roach, auprès duquel, Stan tente en vain d'obtenir une augmentation. Seize ans plus tard, Stan et Oliver arrivent à Newcastle, en Angleterre, pour travailler avec le producteur de spectacles Bernard Delfont.

programme.title: J'ai cru que tu partais sans moi
Five
programme.desc: En train de faire du jet-ski aux abords d'une île paradisiaque, Julia se souvient de sa vie à Paris, un an plus tôt, en compagnie de ses meilleurs amis : Timothée, le fainéant gaffeur, passionné de cuisine, Vadim, l'ami d'enfance attachant, Nestor, l'apprenti avocat et séducteur compulsif, et Samuel, apprenti comédien qui fait se fait financer des études de médecine par son riche père. Alors que tous viennent d'emménager dans une vaste colocation, en grande partie payée par Samuel, celui-ci perd sa source de revenus quand son père découvre qu'il n'apprend pas vraiment la médecine.

programme.title: Birds of Prey et la fantabuleuse histoire de Harley Quinn
programme.desc: Harley Quinn, criminelle endurcie de Gotham City, se souvient de son enfance et de ses jeunes années : née Harleen Quinzel, enfant abandonnée par un père alcoolique, éduquée par des soeurs très rigoristes, très tôt sujette à des accès de violence et finalement brillante étudiante en psychologie. C'est en devenant psychiatre à l'asile d'Arkham, qu'elle croise le chemin du Joker, dont elle tombe amoureuse, et qui fait d'elle une criminelle. Après une rupture brutale, la jeune femme décide de reprendre radicalement sa vie en main.

programme.title: Steak
programme.desc: Dans un pays imaginaire, en 2016, Georges retrouve son ami Blaise après sept ans de séparation. Les codes gestuels et les critères de beauté ont changé depuis leur dernière rencontre. On ne dit plus bonjour mais "bottine" et les jeunes se font refaire le visage, à l'instar des Chivers, une bande de minets très en vue. Georges décide de recourir à la chirurgie esthétique pour devenir l'un des leurs.

programme.title: Cinq nuits
programme.desc: Le grand-père de Simon vient de décéder. Il laisse derrière lui sa maison. En accord avec sa sœur, Simon est venu s'occuper de la maison vacante. Sa sœur Clara lui a aussi demandé d'y retrouver un film qu'il aurait tourné au temps des colonies. Sauf que le grenier est fermé. Simon a le sentiment de ne pas être seul dans cette vielle maison.

programme.title: Real Time with Bill Maher
programme.desc: Le talk-show politique américain qui n'a pas froid aux yeux est de retour. Chaque semaine Bill Maher dissèque avec sérieux et humour l'actualité américaine et internationale entouré d'un panel de chroniqueurs, de journalistes ou de personnalités reconnues pour leurs engagements politiques de tout bord.

programme.title: On verra bien si on se noie
programme.desc: Dans un petit village perdu, trois adolescents désoeuvrés décident de prendre leur vie en mains.

programme.title: Ramdam
programme.desc: Amine, brillant professeur d'histoire des civilisations, à Bordeaux, est courtisé par une université de Boston. Mais avant de partir aux Etats-Unis avec sa femme et ses enfants, il veut régler la vente d'une maison de famille à Saint-Marsain, village où réside son papa Rachid, président du club de rugby local. Les deux hommes ont des relations conflictuelles. Amine est furieux lorsqu'il découvre que son père a acheté les murs de la petite mosquée afin de transformer le lieu en discothèque pour fêter les fins de match.

programme.title: Au nom des fils
programme.desc: Quatre garçons meurent noyés lors d’une sortie en mer organisée par un camp de scouts catholiques. Très vite, la police place l’abbé Vialard, le directeur, en garde à vue. Anne Lotaire, dont le fils Ludovic est décédé en portant secours aux naufragés, découvre que l’association de scoutisme n’est pas agréée par l’Etat et porte plainte. Odile Chasseuil, maman de l’une des victimes, tente de son côté de faire son deuil.

programme.title: La Cordillère des songes
programme.desc: Alors qu'il survole en avion la Cordillère des Andes, le cinéaste Patricio Guzman, exilé depuis quarante ans lors de la dictature militaire, se souvient de sa ville de naissance, Santiago. Il repense également au rapport que les chiliens entretiennent avec la chaîne de montagnes, qu'ils aperçoivent quotidiennement représentée sur une fresque lorsqu'ils prennent le métro. Il évoque le sujet avec son ami à l'origine de cette fresque, Guillermo Munoz Vera. Alors que Guillermo, exilé comme lui, vit en Espagne, Guzman, lui, vit en France. Les deux hommes s'interrogent sur leur rapport à ce lieu et à l'histoire de leur pays.

programme.title: Still Walking
programme.desc: Comme chaque année pendant l'été, la famille Yokoyama se retrouve pour commémorer la mort tragique du fils aîné, décédé quinze ans plus tôt en tentant de sauver un enfant de la noyade. Chacun garde pour lui ses soucis. La fille, Chinami, ne semble guère heureuse auprès de son mari. Le fils, Ryota, cache à tous qu'il est au chômage. Et son père lui reproche son mariage avec une veuve, déjà mère d'un enfant.

programme.title: Tel père, tel fils
programme.desc: Ryota Nonomiya, architecte rigide et exigeant, et son épouse élèvent leur fils Keita, 6 ans. Un jour, les Nonomiya apprennent que suite à un malencontreux échange de bébés à la maternité, Keita n'est pas leur enfant. Leur garçon a en fait été élevé par les Saiki. Le personnel de l'hôpital conseill aux parents de procéder rapidement à l'échange. Les quatre parents préfèrent d'abord passer du temps entre eux. Mais ils sont très différents.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Talk-show.

programme.title: Real Time with Bill Maher
programme.desc: Le talk-show politique américain qui n'a pas froid aux yeux est de retour. Chaque semaine Bill Maher dissèque avec sérieux et humour l'actualité américaine et internationale entouré d'un panel de chroniqueurs, de journalistes ou de personnalités reconnues pour leurs engagements politiques de tout bord.

programme.title: Les saveurs du succès
programme.desc: Carsten et Maggi, parents de deux adorables enfants, mène une vie de rêve. Le couple, passionné, dirige avec brio le Malus, un restaurant très sophistiqué de Copenhague. Tandis que Maggi compose savamment l'atmosphère de l'établissement, Carsten, chef perfectionniste jusqu'à l'obsession, n'attend fébrilement qu'une chose : la visite d'un inspecteur qui leur permettra enfin de remporter la première étoile du Guide Michelin. Alors que la pression est considérable, une lettre anonyme; destinée à Carsten, est déposée au restaurant. Celle-ci affirme que Maggi est amoureuse d'un autre homme.

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: Betty
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 Les filles sont dans la place

programme.title: Virgin Secrets
programme.desc: Melissa Moody, enceinte de plusieurs mois, vient se présenter au domicile des Chase. Elle est reçue par Charlene et Philip, la mère et le frère cadet de Ronnie, mort cinq ans plus tôt. Melissa, qui n'a connu que Ronnie, affirme que le bébé qu'elle attend est de lui. Totalement incrédule et toujours affectée par la mort de son fils, Charlene renvoie aussitôt Melissa, qui part trouver refuge chez Bill et Gail Erwin. Le couple s'occupe de la jeune femme depuis qu'elle est en froid avec ses parents, effrayés par sa crise mystique.

programme.title: Abou Leila
programme.desc: En 1994, dans une Algérie depuis plusieurs années en proie à une violente guerre civile, une fusillade éclate dans les rues d'Alger, au petit matin. Un peu plus tard, deux hommes, S. et Lotfi, sillonnent la lisière du Sahara en voiture à la recherche d'un terroriste, Abou Leila. Les deux hommes ne s'arrêtent que pour dormir dans leur voiture ou dans des hôtels bon marché. Chaque nuit, S., profondément affecté par des prises de médicaments, se réveille en sursaut après des cauchemars, cherchant frénétiquement son souffle. Il est pourtant bien plus fermement convaincu que Lotfi, qu'il leur faut traquer Abou Leila.

programme.title: Pas son genre
programme.desc: Clément Le Guern vient de quitter sa compagne. Auteur d'essais reconnu et professeur de philosophie, Clément, très parisien, apprend avec effroi qu'il est muté à Arras. Heureusement pour lui, son emploi du temps lui permet de passer la moitié de sa semaine à Paris. Mais, dans un salon de coiffure d'Arras, il rencontre Jennifer, qui s'occupe de lui. Clément est sous le charme de cette jeune femme qui lui résiste.

programme.title: Et dehors ils embrassaient le silence
La vallée blanche
programme.desc: En plein cœur de l'hiver, Lucie découvre un village où tout le monde s'est endormi. Fascinée par Noémie, une jeune femme assoupie, Lucie s'installe chez elle.

programme.title: Le coup des larmes
programme.desc: Pour son prochain film, une actrice doit apprendre à tirer à balles réelles. Cette expérience inattendue la met plutôt mal à l'aise. L'apprentissage débute.

programme.title: Un homme au pair
programme.desc: Consultant dans la finance au chômage, Maxime, 48 ans, habite chez sa sœur Jeanne depuis six mois. Elle lui obtient un rendez-vous dans une agence de recrutement. Durant l’entretien, Claire, la directrice, apprend que sa baby-sitter lui fait faux bond pour la soirée. Désemparée, cette mère de famille divorcée fait une offre à Maxime : devenir la nounou de son fils Jérémy, âgé de dix ans, et entretenir sa maison.

programme.title: Une affaire de famille
programme.desc: À Tokyo, Osamu, ouvrier précaire dans le bâtiment, et son fils Shota s'offrent quelques croquettes dans un échoppe de rue après avoir pratiqué leur activité quotidienne et bien rodée, le vol à l'étalage dans une épicerie de leur quartier. Un soir d'hiver, Osamu et Shota découvrent Yuri une fillette transie devant chez elle et la ramènent à la maison. Ayant constaté qu'elle porte des traces de coups sur tout le corps, ils ne se résolvent pas à la rendre à ses parents. La petite Yuri devient un membre à part entière de leur communauté, qui vit d'expédients.

programme.title: Nobody Knows
programme.desc: A Tokyo, Keiko élève seule et clandestinement ses quatre adorables enfants, tous nés de pères différents et n'ayant jamais été scolarisés. Seul l'aîné, Akira, 12 ans, a été déclaré à l'officier de l'Etat civil. Quand Keiko est au bureau, Akira et sa soeur cadette Kyoko doivent prendre soin des deux petits derniers, Shigeru et Yuki. Mais un matin d'hiver, Keiko disparaît mystérieusement, laissant la petite fratrie à la charge d'Akira.

programme.title: Souvenir d'une après-midi d'été
programme.desc: C'est l'été à Corte, il fait chaud. Pour passer l'après-midi, Marie, Lucas et Ghujvanni traînent à la rivière. Ils remarquent qu'un touriste dort pas très loin et se mettent en tête de lui voler son portefeuille.

programme.title: Steak
programme.desc: Dans un pays imaginaire, en 2016, Georges retrouve son ami Blaise après sept ans de séparation. Les codes gestuels et les critères de beauté ont changé depuis leur dernière rencontre. On ne dit plus bonjour mais "bottine" et les jeunes se font refaire le visage, à l'instar des Chivers, une bande de minets très en vue. Georges décide de recourir à la chirurgie esthétique pour devenir l'un des leurs.

programme.title: Billie: In Search of Billie Holiday
programme.desc: Au petit matin du 6 février 1978, le corps d'une jeune journaliste, Linda Lipnack Kuehl, a été découvert dans les rues de Washington D.C. La jeune femme avait consacré les dix dernières années de sa vie à retracer la véritable histoire de la chanteuse Billie Holiday. Dans ce cadre, elle avait enregistré des centaines d'heures d'interviews avec ses proches. Le livre n'a jamais été terminé et les bandes sont longtemps restées inutilisées. James Erskine est parvenu à les récupérer et a décidé de les utiliser comme support à un film sur la chanteuse. Outre la voix de Billie Holiday, on entend donc celles, notamment, de Count Basie, Louis Armstrong ou encore Tony Bennett.

programme.title: Bessie
programme.desc: Bessie Smith voit le jour à la fin du XIXe siècle dans une famille très pauvre, installée dans le Tennessee. Très jeune, elle commence à chanter dans les rues et se fait vite remarquer par la puissance exceptionnelle de sa voix. Au début des années 20, elle parvient à signer un contrat d'enregistrements au sein d'une grosse maison de disques. Grâce à cette collaboration fructueuse, Bessie Smith sera reconnue en tant que chanteuse d'exception aussi bien dans le domaine du jazz que du blues..

programme.title: Mud
programme.desc: Ellis et Neckbone, deux adolescents inséparables, échappent à la surveillance parentale pour une balade en bateau sur le Mississippi. Les deux garçons accostent sur une petite île et ne tardent pas à investir l'épave d'un bateau, logée en haut d'un arbre, qu'ils ont récemment découverte. Ils rencontrent bientôt Mud, un fugitif qui vit dans l'épave. Poursuivi par des chasseurs de primes, ce dernier leur demande de l'aide, en attendant de retrouver sa petite amie, Juniper. Le lendemain, Ellis et Neckbone aperçoivent la jeune femme en ville.

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Dans l'Ohio, Curtis LaForche vit modestement avec sa femme Samantha et leur petite fille sourde, Hannah. Fragile psychologiquement, Curtis est perturbé par des visions apocalyptiques. Persuadé de l'imminence d'un cataclysme, il s'est mis en tête de construire un abri contre les tempêtes dans le jardin. Même s'il consulte un psychologue, Samantha se fait du souci pour lui, d'autant qu'il engage beaucoup de frais pour réaliser son œuvre.

Succession

programme.title: Mes voisines sont toutes coquines
programme.desc: Mes voisines sont toutes coquines.

programme.title: Les heures sombres
programme.desc: Le 9 mai 1940, alors qu'Adolf Hitler a envahi la Tchécoslovaquie, la Pologne, le Danemark et la Norvège, trois millions de soldats allemands sont stationnés à la frontière belges, prêts à envahir le reste de l'Europe. En Angleterre, le Parlement a perdu confiance en Neville Chamberlain, qui cherchait à préserver la paix à n'importe quel prix, et doit lui trouver, très rapidement, un remplaçant. Un nom semble se démarquer, celui du conservateur Winston Churchill, aux positions radicalement opposées à celles de Chamberlain.

programme.title: Trauma Zéro
programme.desc: Dans un futur proche, un homme a recours à un traitement médical pour soigner sa peur de l'eau. Quand il découvre l'origine de sa phobie, sa vie bascule.

programme.title: Shrek 4 : il était une fin
programme.desc: Ayant regagné sa demeure avec femme et enfants, Shrek devrait être heureux. Mais il s'ennuie. Plus personne ne le craint. Lors de la fête d'anniversaire de ses enfants, les tensions s'accumulent pour l'ogre. Les trois petits cochons dévorent le gâteau. Shrek craque et finit par se mettre terriblement en colère. S'éloignant, il rencontre Tracassin, un sorcier qui lui propose un pacte. Contre une signature sur un contrat, il lui offre la possibilité de redevenir un véritable ogre. Shrek accepte… et se réveille dans un monde où plus personne ne le connaît.

programme.title: La sorcière de Noël
programme.desc: Comme chaque année, la Befana, la sorcière préférée des petits italiens, parcourt les villes du pays juchée sur son balais pour distribuer, dans les chaussettes laissées par les bambins, des cadeaux aux enfants sages et du charbon pour ceux qui le sont moins. Mais cette nuit, perturbée par un chien, la Befana n'a pas eu le temps de donner son cadeau à un petit garçon. Vingt-cinq ans plus tard, la Befana oeuvre toujours de nuit, pour préparer celle du 6 janvier, tandis qu'elle se dissimule le jour sous celle de Paola, une institutrice.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Katherine Newbury, une présentatrice de talk show, est entourée d'auteurs masculins qu'elle tyrannise. Brad, son adjoint, lui conseille d'engager une plume féminine. Ce sera la positive Molly, d'origine indienne et dont l'unique expérience est d'écrire des blagues pour ses collègues d'un complexe chimique. Surnommée "huit" par sa nouvelle patronne, Molly fait ce qu'elle peut pour s'imposer. Entre-temps, la patronne de la chaîne annonce à Katherine qu'elle sera bientôt débarquée du show. Avec Molly et son équipe, celle-ci réussit à créer à nouveau le buzz autour de l'émission.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: L'échange des princesses
programme.desc: A Versailles, en 1712, le duc d'Anjou, jalousement veillé par madame de Ventadour, devient le nouvel héritier du trône après la mort du duc de Bretagne. En 1722, Louis XV, âgé de 11 ans, est de retour à Versailles, abandonné sept ans plus tôt. Philippe d'Orléans, régent soucieux d'assurer la paix du royaume, souhaite marier Louis XV avec l'infante d'Espagne, Maria Anna Victoria, âgée de 4 ans. Si l'adolescent accepte, Louise-Elisabeth, la fille de Philippe d'Orléans, se refuse, elle, à épouser le prince des Asturies.

programme.title: Toute ressemblance...
programme.desc: Alors que, traversant une mauvaise passe, il est poursuivi par des paparazzi sous le pont de l'Alma, Cédric Saint Guérande, le plus célèbre présentateur de journal télévisé de France, repense à ses débuts, 18 ans plus tôt, quand le fade Jean-Charles Balin tenait son poste et que Cédric travaillait dans on ombre. Il se souvient du moment où son destin bascule, le 11 septembre 2001, quand il se retrouve à la place de Balin devant les caméras pour présenter le journal télévisé. Pour Cédric, c'est le début d'une irrésistible ascension.

programme.title: American Pie : marions-les !
programme.desc: Sous le regard aimant de son papa, Jim s'est décidé à demander Michelle en mariage. Ravi que celle-ci ait accepté, il souhaite lui organiser une fête inoubliable. Mais le chemin jusqu'à l'autel s'annonce semé d'embuches pour le jeune homme. Entre son enterrement de vie de garçon avec ses amis illuminés, la présentation des deux familles et la pression du jour J, il va en voir de toutes les couleurs.

programme.title: American Pie 4
programme.desc: Treize ans après leur diplôme, Jim et ses amis ont bien changé. Le jeune homme est aujourd'hui marié avec Michelle. Ils ont un petit garçon et des obligations qui nuisent à leur vie sexuelle. Oz et Kevin sont également en couple alors que Finch cherche toujours le grand amour. Tous se réunissent le temps d'un week-end pour participer à une réunion d'anciens du lycée. Évidemment, l'encombrant Stifler ne tarde pas à débarquer.

programme.title: Ma vie en l'air
programme.desc: Yann, trentenaire célibataire et instructeur dans une compagnie aérienne, a une peur panique de l'avion depuis que sa mère est morte au cours d'un vol, en le mettant au monde. Traînant cette phobie comme un fardeau, il multiplie depuis les échecs sentimentaux en compagnie de Ludo, son meilleur ami. Mais l'existence de Yann va bientôt basculer avec l'arrivée d'Alice, sa charmante nouvelle voisine.

programme.title: Si je t'oublie... Je t'aime
programme.desc: Le monde entier est frappé par une mystérieuse maladie qui fait perdre la mémoire à ceux qui en sont frappés. Emma et Jude, deux jeunes mariés, vont devoir affronter cette triste réalité lorsque Jude contracte ce virus, que les scientifiques ont appelé NIA. Jour après jour, le couple invente des stratagèmes pour conserver vivaces les souvenirs de leur rencontre et de leur amour..

programme.title: Yo! Pékin
programme.desc: Le groupe de pop-rappée franco-californien Naive New Beaters crée le buzz en Chine avec une vidéo de danse "Quan Chang Wu" tournée devant la tour Eiffel. Invités par les autorités, David Boring et ses acolytes atterrissent dans la ferveur et la pollution du pays du panda. Mais très vite, leur périple vire au drame diplomatico-politique. Yo! Pekin, le premier "docu-fiction-film d'action-film de vacances".

programme.title: Nicky Larson Private Eyes
programme.desc: Au cours d'une de ses missions en plein coeur du quartier animé de Shinjuku, à Tokyo, Nicky Larson est pris dans une fusillade qui sème destruction et confusion aux alentours. Au même moment, Frank Carter, le père d'Iris Woods meurt dans un étrange accident de voiture. La jeune femme, qui se sent depuis menacée, fait appel à l'agence de Nicky et Laura pour assurer sa sécurité. La jeune femme, célèbre top model, emmène les deux détectives à l'une de ses séances de photo. C'est là qu'il croisent le chemin de Christopher King, patron de la florissante société Dominatech. Mais King est également un ancien camarade de collège de Laura.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: Homme d'affaires à la retraite, Michael Kingley rentre en Australie pour participer à un vote important de l'entreprise que gère désormais son fils et qui concerne un projet minier menaçant de polluer des terres. Sa petite-fille l'implore de ne pas voter en faveur. Une tempête interrompt la réunion qui est remise au lendemain. En parallèle, il est assailli de visions qui ont un lien avec son enfance. Petit garçon, il vivait sur une plage avec son père, entourée d'oiseaux sauvages. Un jour, il commence à prendre soin de bébés pélican dont les parents ont été abattus par des chasseurs.

programme.title: La princesse de Montpensier
programme.desc: En 1562, le roi Charles IX gouverne la France et les guerres de religion font rage. Marie de Mézières, amoureuse d'Henri, duc de Guise, est contrainte par son père d'épouser le prince de Montpensier. Son mari, appelé par le roi à rejoindre la guerre contre les protestants, la laisse en compagnie de son précepteur, le comte de Chabannes, loin du monde, au château de Champigny. La jeune femme, qui ne parvient pas à oublier le duc de Guise, devient malgré elle l’enjeu de passions auxquelles vient se mêler un autre soupirant, le duc d’Anjou, futur Henri III.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Marwen
programme.desc: Pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale, le capitaine Hogie sort in extremis de son avion qui vient de s'écraser dans la campagne belge. Il est bientôt encerclé par des soldats allemands avant d'être sauvé par un commando de jeunes femmes lourdement armées. Mais le capitaine Hogie, ses ennemis et ses sauveuses sont des poupées que Mark Hogencamp manipule et photographie image par image dans son jardin. Cette activité est une forme de thérapie pour l'homme, qui s'est retrouvé amnésique après avoir été violemment agressé par cinq hommes.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Jim, Oz, Kevin et Finch, quatre copains, décident de perdre leur virginité avant de commencer la fac. Chacun a sa méthode. Jim jette son dévolu sur Nadia, tandis qu'Oz entre dans la chorale pour séduire la prude Heather. Kevin veut convaincre sa petite amie Vicky au moyen d'une «bible» sur les plaisirs du sexe. Finch se fait passer pour un «supermâle». Toutes les filles veulent alors être sa cavalière au bal de la promo.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Jim, Oz, Kevin et Finch, quatre jeunes amis, entendent profiter dignement de leurs vacances. Ils louent une maison sur le bord du lac Michigan. Alors que Nadia doit rejoindre Jim à la fin de l'été, ce dernier retrouve Michelle, une flûtiste délurée auprès de laquelle il a beaucoup de choses à apprendre. Quant à Finch, il se prépare à une nouvelle rencontre avec la mère de Stiffler.

programme.title: Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
programme.desc: Alors que Marie-Jeanne Duval est une maman douce, Robert, lui, est un père plutôt effacé, qui gagne sa vie comme chauffeur de taxi. Ensemble, ils ont deux fils et une fille : Albert, brillant mais colérique, Raphaël, un doux rêveur mélomane, et enfin Fleur, la benjamine révoltée. Sur une période d'une douzaine d'années, chacun des membres de cette famille, semblable à beaucoup d'autres, va vivre une journée qui marquera à jamais son existence. Ainsi, pour suivre des études de médecine, Albert s'installe dans un studio et fait la connaissance de sa voisine.

programme.title: Mississippi Grind
programme.desc: Quand il n'écoute pas dans sa voiture des enregistrements contenant des conseils de professionnels du poker, Gerry, lui-même joueur qui traverse une mauvaise passe, écume les salles de jeu du Sud des Etats-Unis. C'est sur l'une d'entre elles qu'il croise Curtis, un jeune joueur aussi volubile que doué, qui adore raconter nombre d'anecdotes pendant qu'il joue. Quelques heures après leur partie, les deux hommes se retrouvent dans un bar pour échanger sur leurs expériences. Gerry est vite fasciné par le côté imprévisible dans le jeu de Curtis.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: Les terroristes tentent d'organiser un autre entretien avec Naja, mais Leon, l'un des otages, tombe malade, ce qui les contraint à demander de l'aide. Philip s'empare de l'occasion pour organiser un raid et envoie deux équipes de tireurs d'élite dans le tunnel. Il ignore que les lieux ont été piégés..

programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: Silas fournit à l'équipe des informations suggérant que l'un des attaquants pourrait avoir un lien avec les militaires. Les relations entre les assaillants se détériorent lorsque l'un des otages est agressé sexuellement. De son côté, Naja réfléchit à la possibilité de faciliter la campagne de collecte de fonds, et trouve un allié en Jonas, le fils de Leon..

IMDb data; ttnr: 7671070, Title: Industry, --- Description: Industry: Created by Mickey Down, Konrad Kay. With Marisa Abela, Myha'la Herrold, David Jonsson, Harry Lawtey. Young bankers and traders make their way in the financial world in the aftermath of the 2008 collapse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7671070/","name":"Industry","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ5ZjllMDgtZWQxZS00YjcwLWEwOTAtMGUxZTNhMGMzMGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Young bankers and traders make their way in the financial world in the aftermath of the 2008 collapse.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7671070/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dishantpatel88","dateCreated":"2020-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Niche Target Audience","reviewBody":"Being in the industry myself as an intern, I can say that there is a lot of truth behind what I've seen in the first episode.

The show definitely has a niche target however, which is probably why there are numerous bad ratings. Many admirable things in the show can only be appreciated by those in the industry/position of the main characters, which makes it that much less appealing to those who aren't.

However, like Suits, there are also some ridiculous blown out of proportion details.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-09","keywords":"london england,finance industry,trader,twenty something,competition","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9684601/","name":"Myha'la Herrold","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3312312/","name":"Marisa Abela","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9657438/","name":"David Jonsson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0618997/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5919315/","name":"Mickey Down","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6181131/","name":"Konrad Kay"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2834022681","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU5ZGFhYzYtYTAwYy00MGQ3LThlMWUtNjI1YWZmNzhiZGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU5ZGFhYzYtYTAwYy00MGQ3LThlMWUtNjI1YWZmNzhiZGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Fuelled by ambition, youth and romance, Industry examines issues of gender, race, class, and privilege in the workplace as five impressionable young minds begin to forge their identities within the pressure cooker environment and sensory blitz of Pierpoint & Co's trading floor, where meritocracy is promised but hierarchy is king."</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Every Brilliant Thing: With Jonny Donahoe, Tobey Maguire. A son creates a list of things worth living for--all in an attempt to raise the spirits of his chronically depressed mother--in this adaptation of the acclaimed one-character show." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7455360/","name":"Every Brilliant Thing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ4ODE1OTctYTYyNC00NzFiLTlmMTEtMWI4MjRmYjczMjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A son creates a list of things worth living for--all in an attempt to raise the spirits of his chronically depressed mother--in this adaptation of the acclaimed one-character show.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7455360/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"koofasa"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Truly amazing!","reviewBody":"There are many reasons this one-man show is great but my gut says the best reason is because no conclusions were drawn about how to solve depression and suicide. It's one mans approach to coping with bipolar disorder in his family and in himself. It is brilliant in every way. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"doctrout"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Pale Imitation of the Original!","reviewBody":"I am a huge fan of Strike Back and I absolutely love the original version! However, the new version (season 6) is a pale comparison to the original and, in fact, after watching the first three episodes now, I am so disappointed by the actor's lack of presence, the writer's inability to compose a compelling plot and, the director's armature effort that I have no further interest in watching any more of the new version!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-05-05","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,revenge,obsession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934618/","name":"Philip Winchester","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495675/","name":"Michelle Lukes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042496/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi209365273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a teaser for the Cinemax limited series "Strike Back: Origins"."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Real Women Have Curves
Echte Frauen haben Kurven
programme.desc:
Real Women Have Curves: Directed by Patricia Cardoso. With America Ferrera, Lupe Ontiveros, Ingrid Oliu, George Lopez. In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0296166/","name":"Real Women Have Curves","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNlNzAxMjktZmViZi00ZmU4LWJjNTYtMzhlZmQzY2FhYzgxL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0296166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"agbeme01"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"How challenging it is for smart children from uneducated families to pursue a higher education","reviewBody":"The movie Real Women Have Curves is a 2002 comedy directed by Patricia Cardoso. Ana (America Ferrera) is a young and smart girl from a Mexican immigrant family, who graduates from the famous Beverly High School of California, and gets accepted in Columbia University with a full scholarship. Controlled by her mother Mrs. Carmen (Lupe Ontiveros), who strongly believes that a girl's fate is to learn to work hard and learn to take care of her future husband. Raul Garcia (Jorge Cervera Jr.) Ana's father and Mr. Guzman (George Lopez) Ana's English teacher play wonderful mediators and defend Ana to go to college. 

This is a movie for everyone to see. Children can confront parents in laughter, while enjoying this together. It reveals the constant battle between mother and daughter, but most of all; it shows how challenging it is for smart children from uneducated families to pursue a higher education.

Although the comedian George Lopez, from the George Lopez show, is not an actor, he gives a high performance in this movie playing the role of the teacher who tries by all means to see one of his smartest students succeeding in what she deserves, despite the character hostile of Lupe Ontiveros, who sees her daughter going against the value of their traditions. 

This movie makes me think of the Cider House Rules, in which Dr. Larch (Michael Caine) always reminds Homer Well (Toby McGuire), his traditions and what he comes to accomplish in life. Like America Ferrera, it is hard for Toby McGuire to break the rules, and leave the orphanage to discover what is out there for him. 

Patricia Cardoso increases the suspense in this movie with the motif "red color," which appears every time America Ferrera's future is being discussed. She makes this screenplay so funny and devoid of bad scenes or language. This is what Robert Ebert from the Chicago Tribune calls "enormously entertaining for moviegoers of any age.""},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-11-08","keywords":"united states,usa,factory,mexican american,latino","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Real Women Have Curves","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi444793113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY2YTFjZjAtMDY4Ny00OTA5LThjZDAtYzAxODE5NGM0YzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY2YTFjZjAtMDY4Ny00OTA5LThjZDAtYzAxODE5NGM0YzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065229/","name":"America Ferrera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648913/","name":"Lupe Ontiveros"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0646488/","name":"Ingrid Oliu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136603/","name":"Patricia Cardoso"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129644/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058851/","name":"Josefina Lopez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0492215/","name":"George LaVoo"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stonedonkies","dateCreated":"2005-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Raw, personal conflict was never so mesmerizing","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under is meticulous, beautiful, daunting, and powerful. One way or another, it will connect with you, perhaps in places you didn't expect and aren't willing to expose. At times wrenching, at other times cathartic, but always staring back at you knowingly, this show stands head and shoulders above the advertising-driven fare that clogs network TV with mediocrity, token minorities, and jarring commercial breaks. It changed the way I view television, and I recommend it to anyone who's tired of the same old crap.

After watching the series finale (which I won't spoil, don't worry), I sat in bed, unable to sleep. After poring over everything I'd seen over the past season, it struck me that SFU is the most raw and personal television show I've ever seen. Even more, there are no stand-alone episodes for easy syndication. Every single installment is part of a huge puzzle, or a few more miles on the Fisher family's road. I've always found Peter Krause to be a disappointingly flat performer, which is unfortunate because his character anchors the show, but the other actors are often transcendent. Regardless, every one of them radiates with a sometimes painfully familiar pathos. The cinematography is also staggering sometimes, taken from film rather than typical 3-camera TV work. If that's not enough, the music they choose to score the episodes is almost symbiotic; it seems ingrained into the film itself, even when you know it was just licensed.

This is not really a family-friendly show, though, encompassing profanity, nudity, violence, drug use, "alternative lifestyles" ... So in other words, it's just like real life. And despite the interpersonal conflicts that fuel the narrative to the point of melodrama, the show isn't afraid to pause every once in a while and let the show communicate without dialogue.

I feel very gratified to have watched SFU, and I've never felt that way about any other show in the almost-27 years I've been alive. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stonedonkies","dateCreated":"2005-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Raw, personal conflict was never so mesmerizing","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under is meticulous, beautiful, daunting, and powerful. One way or another, it will connect with you, perhaps in places you didn't expect and aren't willing to expose. At times wrenching, at other times cathartic, but always staring back at you knowingly, this show stands head and shoulders above the advertising-driven fare that clogs network TV with mediocrity, token minorities, and jarring commercial breaks. It changed the way I view television, and I recommend it to anyone who's tired of the same old crap.

After watching the series finale (which I won't spoil, don't worry), I sat in bed, unable to sleep. After poring over everything I'd seen over the past season, it struck me that SFU is the most raw and personal television show I've ever seen. Even more, there are no stand-alone episodes for easy syndication. Every single installment is part of a huge puzzle, or a few more miles on the Fisher family's road. I've always found Peter Krause to be a disappointingly flat performer, which is unfortunate because his character anchors the show, but the other actors are often transcendent. Regardless, every one of them radiates with a sometimes painfully familiar pathos. The cinematography is also staggering sometimes, taken from film rather than typical 3-camera TV work. If that's not enough, the music they choose to score the episodes is almost symbiotic; it seems ingrained into the film itself, even when you know it was just licensed.

This is not really a family-friendly show, though, encompassing profanity, nudity, violence, drug use, "alternative lifestyles" ... So in other words, it's just like real life. And despite the interpersonal conflicts that fuel the narrative to the point of melodrama, the show isn't afraid to pause every once in a while and let the show communicate without dialogue.

I feel very gratified to have watched SFU, and I've never felt that way about any other show in the almost-27 years I've been alive. Hopefully it will start a trend, if only on premium cable.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127930,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc:
The Hurricane Heist: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace, Ryan Kwanten, Ralph Ineson. Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5360952/","name":"The Hurricane Heist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3Y2MyNjgtMzk4ZS00OTU3LWEwZmMtN2Y0NTdlZjU0NGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5360952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bankofmarquis"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Doesn't Go Far Enough","reviewBody":"There are times when all I want to do is to sit in a darkened movie theater, turn off my brain, and let a movie with a silly, over-the-top premise wash all over me. THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS films are an example of an "A" in this category. Last year's GEOSTORM was a "B" (it was so over-the-top that it was fun, especially when the meteorologist declared - as if he was reciting Shakespeare - "Oh my God, it's a GEOSTORM!"). Unfortunately, a "C" example of this is THE HURRICANE HEIST.

Directed by Rob Cohen - who brought us the original FAST AND FURIOUS film lo' those many years ago - THE HURRICANE HEIST tells the tale of a HEIST set during a...anyone?...HURRICANE. That's pretty much all you need to know of the plot. The rest is action, escapes, weather gone bad, bad guys being bad guys and good guys being good guys.

The good guys are Toby Kebbel (so good as the motion capture bad-guy ape in DAWN OF THE PLANET OF THE APES), perennial "B"-movie actress Maggie Grace (TAKEN, LOST and the immortal HOT GIRL, FAST CAR, EATING A BANANA) and Ryan Kwanten (I guess he was in TRUE BLOOD). What do these good guys have in common? They are not hard to look at on the screen. The two men also have really bad Southern accents.

The bad guys are led by Ralph Ineson ( a perennial "that guy" in such films as STAR WARS: THE LAST JEDI, GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY and KINGSMAN: THE SECRET SERVICE) and a host of "red shirts". The problem is that Ineson plays his bad guy role as a "that guy" and the "red shirts" have no personality at all. One guy tries to be the "loose cannon" but he doesn't go far enough, nor does Ineson or ANY of the bad guys.

Oh...did I mention Ben Cross (Sarek in the new STAR TREK films)? Cross leaped off the screen in the Oscar winning film CHARIOTS OF FIRE way back in 1981 and was going to be "the next big thing". How has that worked out for him? I'm sure he's making a nice living, but...

But...you don't come to this kind of films for the acting. You come to it for the insane premise, the over-the-top acting, the out-of-this-world stunts and special effects. Unfortunately, THE HURRICANE HEIST plays each one of these "safely". The premise is insane, just not insane enough. The acting is melodramatic - just not over-the-top. The script doesn't really have any "oh-my-gosh, did he just say that" lines and the action, stunts and special effects are pretty good, (maybe even good), but not great.

A pretty mediocre time at the movies. It did serve it's purpose, I turned my brain off for two hours. I just wish it didn't power down as well.

Letter Grade: C (thanks for trying)

5 (out of 10) stars and you can take that to the Bank(ofMarquis)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20153,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-03-09","keywords":"disaster movie,hurricane,heist,category 5 hurricane,meteorologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3874076697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0NWYwZjQtNDhlNy00NGE1LWJiOTctMzRiOGJmZmUzYzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM0NWYwZjQtNDhlNy00NGE1LWJiOTctMzRiOGJmZmUzYzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Under the threat of a hurricane, opportunistic criminals infiltrate a US Mint facility to steal $600 million for the ultimate heist. When the hurricane blows up into a lethal CATEGORY 5 storm and their well-made plans go awry, they find themselves needing a vault code known only by one Treasury Agent (Maggie Grace), a need that turns murderous. But the Treasury agent has picked up an unlikely ally, a meteorologist (Toby Kebbell) terrified of hurricanes but determined to save his estranged brother kidnapped by the thieves. He uses his knowledge of the storm as a weapon to win in this non-stop action thriller ride charged with adrenaline throughout."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1527905/","name":"Toby Kebbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477127/","name":"Ryan Kwanten"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139768/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493589/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934698/","name":"Scott Windhauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144003/","name":"Jeff Dixon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277759/","name":"Anthony Fingleton"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bølgen
The Wave – Die Todeswelle
programme.desc:
Bølgen: Directed by Roar Uthaug. With Kristoffer Joner, Ane Dahl Torp, Jonas Hoff Oftebro, Edith Haagenrud-Sande. Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3616916/","name":"Bølgen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE2NmNjOWMtZWJmNC00ZmFiLWI3ZDgtYWU3MWZhOGVhMTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg0NDI1MjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3616916/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wowmats"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"6.5! Decent :)","reviewBody":"The movie is about a geologist that discovers some weird activity in the mountains in Åkneset (Norway) They discover that unless they evacuate the whole city in time, a piece of the mountain will fall into the water and create a monster wave of 80m that will crush everything in its path. So now the geologist played by Kristoffer Joner is doing everything in his power to save his family and his beloved small town.

Short review. Great special effect, good score, good acting. Predictable script and lacks depth, but is still good enough entertainment for the whole family :) There is nothing revolutionary or new about this, but hey! Isn't it always pleasurable when things are done right?

Ps, it's also interesting that this is actually something that has happened before and might happen again!

Final thoughts...GO CHECK IT OUT!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-28","keywords":"natural disaster,disaster,disaster film,norway,flood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2929702169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Even though awaited, no-one is really ready when the mountain pass of ÃƒÂ…kneset above the scenic narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger falls out and creates a 85 meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3616916/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wowmats","dateCreated":"2015-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"6.5! Decent :)","reviewBody":"The movie is about a geologist that discovers some weird activity in the mountains in Åkneset (Norway) They discover that unless they evacuate the whole city in time, a piece of the mountain will fall into the water and create a monster wave of 80m that will crush everything in its path. So now the geologist played by Kristoffer Joner is doing everything in his power to save his family and his beloved small town.

Short review. Great special effect, good score, good acting. Predictable script and lacks depth, but is still good enough entertainment for the whole family :) There is nothing revolutionary or new about this, but hey! Isn't it always pleasurable when things are done right?

Ps, it's also interesting that this is actually something that has happened before and might happen again!

Final thoughts...GO CHECK IT OUT!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-28","keywords":"natural disaster,disaster,disaster film,norway,flood","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2929702169","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Even though awaited, no-one is really ready when the mountain pass of ÃƒÂ…kneset above the scenic narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger falls out and creates a 85 meter high violent tsunami. programme.title: Dark Tide
Dark Tide
programme.desc:
Dark Tide: Directed by John Stockwell. With Halle Berry, Olivier Martinez, Sizwe Msutu, Mark Elderkin. A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1507563/","name":"Dark Tide","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTUxOTc3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDkwOTgzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1507563/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rik-317-369787"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad","reviewBody":"I liked Darktide mainly because of it's camera work and portrayal of the Great White shark.

The underwater camera work appeared to be original and was impressive in terms of continuity, unlike most shark films where footage is borrowed from a documentary and pasted in.

The behaviour of the sharks is also more realistic, showing that people with experience can swim with them outside the cage and not be attacked.

The film is let down by a thin plot and bland characters.

I would rate this as the third best shark movie after Jaws(obviously) and The Reef(underrated).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-04-12","keywords":"shark,jelly fish,touching a shark,can of beer,spear gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2116264217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2ODQ2NDgwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA5ODgzNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2ODQ2NDgwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA5ODgzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the exclusive trailer premiere for the new thriller starring Halle Berry and Olivier Martinez, available via video on demand 3/8 and in theaters 3/30."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000932/","name":"Halle Berry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0553648/","name":"Olivier Martinez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114460/","name":"Ralph Brown"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007082/","name":"John Stockwell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0295380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0291625/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345025/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3602980/","name":"Amy Sorlie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159892/","name":"Ronnie Christensen"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bad Boys
Bad Boys – Harte Jungs
programme.desc:
Bad Boys: Directed by Michael Bay. With Lisa Boyle, Michael Taliferro, Emmanuel Xuereb, Tchéky Karyo. Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112442/","name":"Bad Boys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE1ZTQ0ZTEtZTEwZS00NWE0LTlmMDUtMTE1ZWJiZTYzZTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Casa2000"},"dateCreated":"1999-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Michael Bay: The Next Big Thing","reviewBody":"I had no high hopes when I walked into this film. I like Will Smith, I like Martin Lawrence, so I figured this film will at least be funny. And it was funny, and then some. It was action packed, thrilling and a helluva good time. I came out of the theatre thinking that the guy who directed that movie is going to be huge.

Michael Bay, former music video and commercial director, has made an incredible directorial debut. The film never stops. When it isn't action-packed, it is funny. It is sexy, fun and always moving. Christian Wagner's editing is phenomenal. I love action movies that really try to be action movies. A lot of action films know that they are action films so they try to incorporate other genres to make the film more complete, but they often fail miserably. They try so hard to be something they are not that they forget what they are in the first place. The essence of the action film is the action. It is a necessary component, it needs to be there otherwise it loses its edge. "Bad Boys" doesn't just throw in the occassional action sequence to meet the expectations of the genre, but instead uses the action to help tell the story. It is this use of filmmaking that allows an action film to remain an action film and still go beyond.

Watch "Bad Boys" again and every time there is an action sequence, ask yourself why that was there and what did it accomplish. You will find that each sequence took the film to another level; it introduced an new conflict, it increased the present conflict, it eliminated a key character, it introduced a new character, and so on. There are a lot of action films out there that sacrifice story for spectacle, and the audience notices this. At the centre of all films lies the story and if it comes to a halt so does the interest of the viewers.

"Bad Boys" of course isn't the greatest story on film, or even in the action genre, but what is so appealing and memorable about "Bad Boys" is that it is just as entertaining with its story as it is with its action by combining the two without sacrificing either. Michael Bay understands the importance of the story within the structure of the film. He tells a visual story, entertaining and complete, and leaves you very satisfied. Watch for Michael Bay because he is here to stay."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":252490,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1995-04-07","keywords":"miami florida,buddy movie,criminal investigation,murder investigation,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bad Boys","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2344091929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102288/","name":"Lisa Boyle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303032/","name":"George Gallo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057398/","name":"Michael Barrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611848/","name":"Jim Mulholland"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112442/","name":"Bad Boys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE1ZTQ0ZTEtZTEwZS00NWE0LTlmMDUtMTE1ZWJiZTYzZTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112442/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Casa2000","dateCreated":"1999-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Michael Bay: The Next Big Thing","reviewBody":"I had no high hopes when I walked into this film. I like Will Smith, I like Martin Lawrence, so I figured this film will at least be funny. And it was funny, and then some. It was action packed, thrilling and a helluva good time. I came out of the theatre thinking that the guy who directed that movie is going to be huge.

Michael Bay, former music video and commercial director, has made an incredible directorial debut. The film never stops. When it isn't action-packed, it is funny. It is sexy, fun and always moving. Christian Wagner's editing is phenomenal. I love action movies that really try to be action movies. A lot of action films know that they are action films so they try to incorporate other genres to make the film more complete, but they often fail miserably. They try so hard to be something they are not that they forget what they are in the first place. The essence of the action film is the action. It is a necessary component, it needs to be there otherwise it loses its edge. "Bad Boys" doesn't just throw in the occassional action sequence to meet the expectations of the genre, but instead uses the action to help tell the story. It is this use of filmmaking that allows an action film to remain an action film and still go beyond.

Watch "Bad Boys" again and every time there is an action sequence, ask yourself why that was there and what did it accomplish. You will find that each sequence took the film to another level; it introduced an new conflict, it increased the present conflict, it eliminated a key character, it introduced a new character, and so on. There are a lot of action films out there that sacrifice story for spectacle, and the audience notices this. At the centre of all films lies the story and if it comes to a halt so does the interest of the viewers.

"Bad Boys" of course isn't the greatest story on film, or even in the action genre, but what is so appealing and memorable about "Bad Boys" is that it is just as entertaining with its story as it is with its action by combining the two without sacrificing either. Michael Bay understands the importance of the story within the structure of the film. He tells a visual story, entertaining and complete, and leaves you very satisfied. Watch for Michael Bay because he is here to stay.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":252490,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1995-04-07","keywords":"miami florida,buddy movie,criminal investigation,murder investigation,usa","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bad Boys","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2344091929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjExNzlmNDgtYTI4NC00OTg3LTk3MTgtZTI4YzkxNjY1NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102288/","name":"Lisa Boyle"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303032/","name":"George Gallo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057398/","name":"Michael Barrie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611848/","name":"Jim Mulholland"],"duration":"PT1H59M"</script><metacontent="

The Quake – Das grosse Beben
programme.desc: Skjelvet: Directed by John Andreas Andersen. With Kristoffer Joner, Ane Dahl Torp, Edith Haagenrud-Sande, Kathrine Thorborg Johansen. In 1904 an earthquake of magnitude 5.4 on the Richter scale shook Oslo, with an epicenter in the "Oslo Graben" which runs under the Norwegian capital. There are now signs that indicate that we can expect a major future earthquake in Oslo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6523720/","name":"Skjelvet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjYzYWRlZmEtNTQzZC00ZmE2LThjNzAtMDY3ZmNmYmJiMjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAzODU1NDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1904 an earthquake of magnitude 5.4 on the Richter scale shook Oslo, with an epicenter in the "Oslo Graben" which runs under the Norwegian capital. There are now signs that indicate that we can expect a major future earthquake in ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6523720/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dakjets"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie in its genre","reviewBody":"A few years ago, the film The Wave came out and became a big success in Norway. The same people have now made this and the same actors and characters are still here. The films are both catastrophe films, but the action is now moved to the capital Oslo. The title indicates well what is going to happen here? Unlike other movies in this genre, this attempts to convey feelings and a story about a family in dissolution. Pretty successful too, the protagonists manage to get a drama out of the situation they are in and their lives. Everything is clearly building up to the event as well as what we are going to see, namely the quake. The effects are good and perfectly done. Good sequences. The movie may be a bit of a hassle before it gets any action, but I can still recommend this movie to those who like this genre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11042,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-08-31","keywords":"oslo norway,destruction,geology,urban setting,tunnel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2559162905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODFmOTQ5NTQtODdiZi00MTIxLWJhNzgtMjVjMDBlMjFmYmVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODFmOTQ5NTQtODdiZi00MTIxLWJhNzgtMjVjMDBlMjFmYmVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Oslo, Norway, prepares for the biggest earthquake it has seen since 1904. And I loved it.","reviewBody":"This movie has a generic plot, damsel in distress, the bad guys, the overpowered superhero that can kill anyone in the most stylish and ridiculous ways... but it's entertaining, like if you don't think about the plot too much and you just want to enjoy the good guy punish the bad guys and bring a small piece of justice to the world.\n\nCool slow-motion scenes, cool fight scenes (ridículous, but cool), and Denzel is great at this role. programme.title: Homefront
Homefront
programme.desc: Homefront: Directed by Gary Fleder. With Jason Statham, James Franco, Izabela Vidovic, Kate Bosworth. A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2312718/","name":"Homefront","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwOTAzNzAwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTc1NDIyMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2312718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"octomancer"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid action fillum","reviewBody":"There is nothing wrong with this film. I thought JS's acting was pretty good. Compares favourably to other action stars' attempts over the years. I really enjoyed seeing Kate Bosworth, Winona Ryder and James Franco playing against type. Franco can be a bit hit and miss, he shines in the right roles, but others he struggles with (Annapolis for example). Definitely a hit here, his bad guy had more nuance than was strictly written into the part.
